code: @Test public void testRetrievePost() {     final Post post = servicePosts.retrieve(1).     assertThat(post, not(nullValue())).     assertThat(post.getId(), is(greaterThan(0))). }

@Test public void testCreatePost() {     final Post entity = new Post().     entity.setAuthor(2).     entity.setTitle(new Content("hello from postman 2")).     entity.setContent(new Content("hello world 2")).     entity.setFormat(Format.standard).     final Post post = servicePosts.create(entity).     assertThat(post, not(nullValue())).     assertThat(post.getId(), is(9)). }

@Test public void testListPosts() {     final PostSearchCriteria criteria = new PostSearchCriteria().     criteria.setPage(1).     criteria.setPerPage(10).     final List<Post> posts = servicePosts.list(criteria).     assertThat(posts, is(not(emptyCollectionOf(Post.class)))).     assertThat(posts.size(), is(10)). }
